## EntityViews type

Extracts all entity views from a read model

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EntityViews<AllViews extends ReadModel> = {
    [P in keyof AllViews]: AllViews[P] extends EntityProjection ? AllViews[P] : never;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [ReadModel](./paramodel.readmodel.md)<!-- -->, [EntityProjection](./paramodel.entityprojection.md)
